channel.title: Grand Exchange Item Descriptions
channel.description:
Does anyone know which packet you have to send with string I'm guessing to display the Item Description of the Item in Buy Offer / Sell Offer windows right under the item name on the right box.
[b]Solved[/b]
This is for 530 revision of runescape
Tested all Child's for Interface 105 (grand exchange)
like so
answer was 105, 142 for Selling and Buying
[code] p.getPackets().modifyText("AAAAAAA", 105, 140); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("BBBBBB", 105, 142); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("CCCCCCC", 105, 145); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("DDDDDD", 105, 143); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("EEEEEeE", 105, 177); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("FFFFFFFF", 105, 180); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("GGGGGGG", 105, 183); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("HHHHHHH", 105, 201); //test p.getPackets().modifyText("JJJJJJJJJ", 105, 143); //test [/code]

item.title: Grand Exchange Item Descriptions
item.dc:creator: @sspoke sspoke
item.description:
@sspoke wrote:

Does anyone know which packet you have to send with string I’m guessing to display the Item Description of the Item in Buy Offer / Sell Offer windows right under the item name on the right box.

Solved

This is for 530 revision of runescape

Tested all Child’s for Interface 105 (grand exchange)

like so

answer was 105, 142 for Selling and Buying

                p.getPackets().modifyText("AAAAAAA", 105, 140); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("BBBBBB", 105, 142); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("CCCCCCC", 105, 145); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("DDDDDD", 105, 143); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("EEEEEeE", 105, 177); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("FFFFFFFF", 105, 180); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("GGGGGGG", 105, 183); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("HHHHHHH", 105, 201); //test
                p.getPackets().modifyText("JJJJJJJJJ", 105, 143); //test

Read full topic
